version_description:
Hey Jodelers,
In this version we fixed some bugs but they are so techy and tiny that we instead decided to simply communicate a big THANK YOU to all of you.

Thanks that you’re using our app. We value every one of you & wish you already merry Christmas!
Something else? Just write to idea@jodel.com.

Jooooodelhaaaaauuiitiii,
Your Jodel Team

Hey Jodelers,
In this version we fixed some bugs but they are so techy and tiny that we instead decided to simply communicate a big THANK YOU to all of you.

Thanks that you’re using our app. We value every one of you & wish you already merry Christmas!
Something else? Just write to idea@jodel.com.

Jooooodelhaaaaauuiitiii,
Your Jodel Team

2017, here we jodel again!
Our new year’s resolution: Giving you access to more authentic, local conversations than ever. This version includes:

- A smoother “Swipe to get back” gesture
- Voiceover fixes
- Localization improvements

Feedback? Just write to idea@jodel.com!

Jooooodelhaaaaauuiitiii,
Your Jodel Team

Jooooodelhaaaaauuiitiii,

“If the whole is ever to gladden thee, that whole in the smallest thing thou must see” - Goethe

- Simpler design: New tab bar icons & Hometown indicators
- Moderators can now continue to moderate after the Picture of the day

How do you like the new version? Just write to idea@jodel.com or use the hashtag #feedback on Jodel!

Fun Fact: Before the name Jodel was chosen, the name of the app temporary was “Mumpitz” (Funny German word – try to pronounce it) xP

In this version we fixed the bugs with the 3D touch menu. We also introduced an automated refresh call for the mainfeed whenever you haven’t opened the app for a long time. This way you are able to get the most recent Jodel around you without scrolling!

Your feedback is our oxygen. Just write to idea@jodel.com or use the hashtag #feedback on Jodel!

Fun Fact: Before the name Jodel was chosen, the name of the app temporary was “Mumpitz” (Funny German word – try to pronounce it) xP

In this version we fixed the bugs with the 3D touch menu. We also introduced an automated refresh call for the mainfeed whenever you haven’t opened the app for a long time. This way you are able to get the most recent Jodel around you without scrolling!

Your feedback is our oxygen. Just write to idea@jodel.com or use the hashtag #feedback on Jodel!

Introducing: Share a Jodel!
Share a Jodel lets share the best Jodels, most exciting stories and funniest pictures with all your friends!

Besides that, we worked on making your Jodel experience even smoother and more awesome by eliminating the following bugs:

• Camera Crash Fix
• Enabled copying, selecting, looking up and sharing in the contextual text menu
• Notifications collapse

Jodel exists to let you instantly engage with the community around you!  If you have any suggestions write to idea@jodel.com or use the hashtag #feedback on Jodel!

New:
- You voted for a Pink color on Jodel. With this release we are supporting a 7th color in the feed.

Improvements:
- If you want to see who reacted to a Jodel, the icons are not pixelated any more.
- If you see video ads, the audio will be default off from now on.
- A crash was fixed when you quickly scroll up in a Jodel.

We hope you like the new feature and improvement! Your Jodel Team!
